getCallingUid().Description: Retrieves the current calling UID. Exposed to support test mocking

DriveEventService().Description: Creates a new event service instance with a default name.

onBind(android.content.Intent).FullName: public final synchronized IBinder onBind (Intent intent)

Parameters: the name of the event service, used to name the worker thread (for debugging).
DriveEventService(java.lang.String).Description: Creates a new event service instance.

ClassDesc: Abstract base class for a bound service that handles Drive events. These events will be delivered using AIDL calls to the service. The base class handles binding and handling of these calls and will raise listener events on the subclass. Subclasses should override one or more of the following interfaces depending upon the event types that expected by the application: @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#events#ChangeListener_E@ @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#events#CompletionListener_E@ The default implementation of all listener methods (onListener) methods will log an unhandled event warning to indicate that an unexpected event type was received. Subclasses should override these methods for any expected event types to provide appropriate handling. The implementation subclass must be listed as an exported service in the Android manifest for the application.
